inclusion.criterion: Cases must have diastolic dysfunction documented by echocardiography an interval of six month before the time of enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Control subjects must not have diastolic dysfunction documented by echocardiography in an interval of six month before the time of enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: All subjects will be in sinus rhythm.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: All patients will have a left ventricular ejection fraction of > 55% but less than <70%.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: All patients will have normal systolic and diastolic cardiac dimensions on the qualifying echocardiogram.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD. Pulmonary consult recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial.
